body_html: Sorry, but what exactly is the problem? It doesn't matter if you use hidden or combined - you're composing linear operators, so you can alternatively use a single one, which is what the code does in here. Also, if you want to discuss that please open an issue in pytorch/tutorials repo (that's where they are hosted). Thanks!

body: Sorry, but what exactly is the problem? It doesn't matter if you use `hidden` or `combined` - you're composing linear operators, so you can alternatively use a single one, which is what the code does in here. Also, if you want to discuss that please open an issue in pytorch/tutorials repo (that's where they are hosted). Thanks!
